languages.text: "Я хотел бы оказать вам поддержку в решении ваших непосредственных проблем. Насколько мне известно, судно понесло существенные потери во время недавнего бунта и пострадало от действий культистов, вдобавок вы потеряли множество ценных офицеров. Вы в непростой ситуации. Я готов предложить помощь".

traits.locale_text: "Я хотел бы оказать вам поддержку с решением ваших непосредственных проблем. Насколько мне известно, судно понесло существенные потери во время недавнего бунта и пострадало от действий культистов, вдобавок вы потеряли множество ценных офицеров".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."
languages.original_text: "Я хотел бы оказать вам поддержку в решении ваших непосредственных проблем. Насколько мне известно, судно понесло существенные потери во время недавнего бунта и пострадало от действий культистов, вдобавок вы потеряли множество ценных офицеров. Вы в непростой ситуации. Я готов предложить помощь".

traits.locale_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我愿意协助你解决迫在眉睫的问题。我知道，这艘飞船最近发生了叛变，还遭到了邪教徒的袭击。你们承受了惨重损失，失去了许多有价值的军官，目前的处境非常艰难。我愿意为你效力。”
languages.original_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意协助你解决迫在眉睫的问题。我知道，这艘飞船最近发生了叛变，还遭到了邪教徒的袭击。你们承受了惨重损失，失去了许多有价值的军官，目前的处境非常艰难。我愿意为你效力。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Me gustaría ofrecer mi ayuda para la resolución de sus problemas inmediatos. Soy consciente de que la nave sufrió bajas considerables durante el motín reciente y resultó dañada por las acciones de los sectarios. Sin duda, también habrá perdido a numerosos oficiales esenciales. Está en una situación difícil, permítame que le ayude».
languages.original_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría ofrecer mi ayuda para la resolución de sus problemas inmediatos. Soy consciente de que la nave sufrió bajas considerables durante el motín reciente y resultó dañada por las acciones de los sectarios. Sin duda, también habrá perdido a numerosos oficiales esenciales. Está en una situación difícil, permítame que le ayude».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我は、あなた方の当面の問題を解決するための援助を提供したい。先日の反乱と教団の行動によって、この船はかなりの損害を受けたことは承知している。さらには、多くの貴重な士官も失ったことも。あなたは困難な状況にある。だからこそ、我があなたに手を貸そう」
languages.original_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."

traits.locale_text: 「我は、あなた方の当面の問題を解決するための援助を提供したい。先日の反乱と教団の行動によって、この船はかなりの損害を受けたことは承知している。さらには、多くの貴重な士官も失ったことも。あなたは困難な状況にある。だからこそ、我があなたに手を貸そう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je voudrais vous proposer mon aide pour résoudre vos problèmes immédiats. Je sais vous avez subi des pertes considérables lors de la mutinerie, que le vaisseau a été endommagé par les cultistes et que de nombreux officiers ont également perdu la vie. Vous vous trouvez dans une situation difficile. Je suis à votre entière disposition. »
languages.original_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."

traits.locale_text: « Je voudrais vous proposer mon aide pour résoudre vos problèmes immédiats. Je sais vous avez subi des pertes considérables lors de la mutinerie, que le vaisseau a été endommagé par les cultistes et que de nombreux officiers ont également perdu la vie. Vous vous trouvez dans une situation difficile. Je suis à votre entière disposition. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euch gerne meine Hilfe bei Euren dringlichen Probleme anbieten. Mir ist bewusst, dass das Schiff während der letzten Meuterei beträchtliche Verluste erleiden musste und durch die Kultisten beschädigt wurde. Dazu habt Ihr einige wertvolle Offiziere verloren. Ihr steckt in einer schwierigen Situation. Ich stehe zu Eurer Verfügung."
languages.original_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte Euch gerne meine Hilfe bei Euren dringlichen Probleme anbieten. Mir ist bewusst, dass das Schiff während der letzten Meuterei beträchtliche Verluste erleiden musste und durch die Kultisten beschädigt wurde. Dazu habt Ihr einige wertvolle Offiziere verloren. Ihr steckt in einer schwierigen Situation. Ich stehe zu Eurer Verfügung."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."

languages.text: "Şu an içinde bulunduğun sorunları çözmede sana yardımlarımı sunmayı isterim. Geminin kısa süre önceki başkaldırı esnasında kayda değer zayiat verdiğinin, tarikatçıların eylemleri sonucunda hasar gördüğünün ve kıymetli pek çok subayını da kaybettiğinin farkındayım. Oldukça zor bir vaziyettesin. Bense emrine amadeyim."
languages.original_text: "I would like to offer my assistance in resolving your immediate problems. I am aware that the ship suffered considerable losses during the recent mutiny and was damaged by the cultists' actions, and you have lost many valuable officers as well. You are in a difficult situation. I am at your disposal."
